item.description:
We will be doing the Mt Liberty and Flume hike.

Leave: 5am, sharp, from Boston/cambridge  area

Start Hike: 8am
Limited to 10 people
Return: Around 6pm, same day


Will probably choose a fairly strenuous hike, so please RSVP accordingly

We will be going up the notorious Flume slide trail and then looping around via the Liberty spring trail. We wish to keep a good pace to keep this hike challenging.

Hike stats - 10miles, elevation gain of 3700 ft and book time of 6.45 hrs.

More details can be found at the following pages- http://home.earthlink.net/~ellozy/liberty.html

http://www.hike-nh.com/trips/flume_lib/

 

ABSOLUTE ESSENTIALS:

# We have several stream crossings so sturdy, water proof and good grip shoes.

# At least 3 liters of water

# Sufficient high calorie food to eat

# Since we will be above tree-line need wind and rain jackets.

# Head lamps and whistle.

 

Beautiful weather forecast for saturday which can be tracked here http://forecast.weather.gov/MapClick.php?lat=44.1158991&lon=-71.64202599999999&site=all&smap=1&searchresult=Mt%20Liberty%2C%20White%20Mountain%20National%20Forest%2C%20Lincoln%2C%20NH%2003251%2C%20USA
item.name: White Mountains Hike - Mt Liberty and Flume
